properties.areaDesc: Vermillion, IN; Warren, IN; Fountain, IN; Parke, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 16 at 9:48AM EST until January 23 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...A Flood Warning continues for portions of the following waterways
in Indiana...

East Fork White River...Wabash River...White River...

.As of Thursday morning, minor to moderate flooding continues on the
Wabash, White, and East Fork White Rivers in central and southern
Indiana.

Crests will be/are comparable to those that occurred in February
and June of 2019.

The Wabash River is cresting between Terre Haute and Riverton.
The White River crest is near Edwardsport.  The crest along the East
Fork White River is near Bedford. Flooding along the lower portions
of the White and Wabash River is likely to continue until at least
the end of the month.

Approximately an inch of rain is expected between Friday night and
Saturday with some wintry mix Friday night will prolong flooding in
areas already flooding and may lead to isolated renewed flooding
along smaller streams.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Wabash River at Covington.
* until Thursday January 23.
* At  8:45 AM Thursday the stage was 21.1 feet.
* Flood stage is 16.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...It will continue to fall to below flood stage by
Thursday January 23.
* At 21.0 feet...Lanes to river residences west of South River Road
south of Covington flooded.  Sandhill Road at Mud Run just
northeast of Covington begins to flood.  Extensive lowland flooding
in progress.  Higher bottomlands flood.
properties.instruction:
Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Motorists should never drive into flood water. Turn around and go
another way. Keep children away from flooded areas. Recreational and
agricultural interests should remain alert to changing river
conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web and
click on rivers and lakes.
